mapper.update: update ecs_brand set brand_name = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_logo = #{brandLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_img = #{brandImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, site_url = #{siteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort_order = #{sortOrder,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_show = #{isShow,jdbcType=BIT}, brand_desc = #{brandDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, wap_brand_desc = #{wapBrandDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
mapper.select: select brand_id, brand_name, brand_logo, brand_img, site_url, sort_order, is_show, brand_desc, wap_brand_desc from ecs_brand where brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
select brand_id, brand_name, brand_logo, brand_img, site_url, sort_order, is_show, brand_desc, wap_brand_desc from ecs_brand
